abstract: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts, the private equity giant now listed on the New York Stock Exchange, said that it was withdrawing a planned $500 million stock offering and reported a 29 percent drop in earnings for its second quarter.
snippet: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts, the private equity giant now listed on the New York Stock Exchange, said that it was withdrawing a planned $500 million stock offering and reported a 29 percent drop in earnings for its second quarter.
lead_paragraph: 8:26 p.m. | Updated Kohlberg Kravis Roberts, the private equity giant now listed on the New York Stock Exchange, said that it was withdrawing a planned $500 million stock offering and reported a 29 percent drop in earnings for its second quarter.
